english.segment1: Amazing grace, how sweet the sound. That saved a wretch like me. I once was lost, but now I'm found. Was blind but now I see
english.segment2: Amazing grace, how sweet the sound. That saved a wretch like me. I once was lost, but now I'm found. Was blind but now I see
english.segment3: (Chorus). Because your love came down. Your love came down. Your love came down. And it saved, it saved me
english.segment4: . Through many dangers, toils and snares. I have already come. 'Twas grace that brought me safe this far. And grace will lead me home
english.segment6: (Chorus 2). Cause your love came down. And you turned me around. And your love came down. And it saved me, it saved me
english.segment7: When we've been there ten thousand years. Bright-shining as the sun. We've no less days to sing God's praise. Than when we first begun
english.segment9: Thanks to KJM for these lyrics.
